name: Tetrassault Alpha v1
description:
Tetrassault is a versus game where each side has a unique playstyle. In this game, one player takes on the role of a nimble Human, and must shoot down the powerful Alien, played by the other player.

By taking influence from many classic games, and a dash from most genres that Blizzard has touched, this game has been brewed to provide days of unique matches with fast-paced and challenging combat.

This game is currently a work in progress and will continue to improve. The core gameplay is ready for play, but before adding the rest of the planned content, the core needs to be balanced from feedback. Content will continue to be added, so please try the game, leave some feedback, and keep an eye out for new versions.

Please visit http://tetrassault.weebly.com for more information, a how to play guide, and game updates.
